description: Sweet Birch (Betula lenta) is an amazing species of trees for its versatility. With beautiful shades of yellow and white, its bark is particularly striking. Sweet birch has a hard, rot-resistant heartwood, making it an excellent choice for timber. Its flexibility also makes it a great choice for living fences, for example. The edible sap is good for both humans and wildlife. Sweet Birch is also a great source of Vitamin C and a popular flavoring for beverages and candy, as well as being a traditional medicinal remedy. In short, Sweet Birch has so many uses and qualities, it's no wonder why it's so amazing.
